GxCellEditors

Class GxCellEditorBasicBooleanRichSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorAbstract
      • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorSelect
        • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorRichSelect
          • GxCellEditors.GxCellEditorBasicBooleanRichSelect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GxCellEditorInterface

    public class GxCellEditorBasicBooleanRichSelect
extends GxCellEditorRichSelect
    A simple boolean editor based on the GxCellEditorRichSelect. The editor provides a select box where the user can selected one of the three values (true , false , none)
    #OnlyGUI
    #Enterprise

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BBjString UsedFalseValue!
      The value to use when when the component needs to return a false value.
      BBjString UsedNoneValue!
      The value to use when when the component needs to return a none/empty/null value.
      BBjString UsedTrueValue!
      The value to use when when the component needs to return a true value.

      • UsedTrueValue!

      • UsedFalseValue!

      • UsedNoneValue!

        public BBjString UsedNoneValue!
        The value to use when when the component needs to return a none/empty/null value. in case it is null() , then the none option will be hidden from the rendered list
